description: This file serves as the entry point for a React-based web application. It imports React, ReactDOM, global CSS, and the main App component, then renders the App inside a DOM element with id 'root' using React 18's createRoot API.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root React node for rendering the app in the DOM

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree inside the root element
